episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Kevin reveals his episode of The Goldbergs is all about Batman, Marc and Kevin speculate about Ben Affleck’s latest doubts and comments about his stand alone Batman movie, and Bright Lights the Carrie Fisher movie is moved up.

After that we travel to the trailer park in the Fat Cave to listen to Kevin and Marc watch and react to trailers for Guardians 2, Blade Runner 2049, War for the Planet of the Apes, and The Mummy.

episodes.title: 86: Brad Meltzer in the Fat Cave

episodes.title: 85: Fat Cave Far, Far Away
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! Kevin & Marc open the Utility Belt and talk about how BATMAN FOREVER came out 20 years ago this week, how Aquaman and the Flash are introduced in BATMAN V SUPES, the JURASIC WORLD broke box office records, GAME OF THRONES finale heart break, how the PEANUTS MOVIE trailer is fantastic, COMIC-CON NEWS, and much more!

episodes.title: 84: Fat Cave Live, Too
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! Kevin & Marc pack the Utility Belt full of enough movie, tv and comic book talk to choke a Robin! Hear all about the official BATMAN V SUPERMAN plot synopsis, the new PUNISHER, JURASSIC WORLD and what a nice guy Chris Pratt is, how James Cameron feels about the new TERMINATOR flick, Stanis Burn-Rathian, and much more!

episodes.title: 83: Fat Cave Live
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, Kevin and Marc do another all-Utility Belt show, originally Live Streamed on the SModCo YouTube channel! In this ep, the Bat-Fans discuss the Bat-Spear, the new Aquaman director, Tilda Swinton and Charlize Theron in new Marvel movies, Big Rock in a new Little China, and Coldemort, the Game of Thrones White Walker!

episodes.title: 82: Mad Max & George Miller’s Justice League
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! Kevin and Marc pack the Utility Belt full of talk about Suicide Squad, Civil War, Static Shock, the Flash season finale and more! After that, it’s Miller time! Kevin and Marc fellate George Miller’s instant classic MAD MAX: FURY ROAD, and we hear an old interview with Adam Brody in which he talks about the George Miller JUSTICE LEAGUE movie that nearly happened!

episodes.title: 80: Joe Quesada: Daredevil’s Step-Dad Steps Up
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! We’re still talking about the Netflix original series Marvel’s DAREDEVIL. But this week, Kev is joined by Marvel’s own Joe Quesada, who gives on-set, in-production insight into the making of another amazing piece of Marvel media! Learn how it all happened and where it’s all going from Daredevil’s best buddy outside of Foggy Nelson!

episodes.title: 81: Big Fat Utility Belt
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, Kevin and Marc get back to the Bat and talk about the Batman V Superman trailer, the first Suicide Squad movie images, Dark Knight 3, and add a side of Age of Ultron.

episodes.title: 79: Digging Daredevil
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, it’s an entire episode of Utility Belt, as Kevin and Marc take a day trip away from Gotham to visit the mean streets of Hell’s Kitchen and gush about the new Netflix series Marvel’s DAREDEVIL.

episodes.title: 78: Gotham Gets Gooder
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! Kevin and Marc Bernardin provide another commentary track nobody asked for, this time to Fox’s GOTHAM Episode 2. And things look lots brighter for our Dark Knight.

episodes.title: 77: Going to GOTHAM
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! Kevin and Marc Bernardin provide a commentary track nobody asked for to the pilot of Fox’s GOTHAM. The extended pilot is only 49 minutes, yet somehow, the podcast about the extended pilot is 61 minutes longer.

episodes.title: 76: Fat Man & Bernardin & Batman & Robin, Pt. 2
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: This week in the Fat Cave! When Gotham lies in ashes, then this franchise has my permission to die! Kevin and Marc Bernardin continue to watch the worst thing to happen to Batman since his parents were killed: 1997’s BATMAN & ROBIN. It’s Part 2 of a 2 Part commentary track!

episodes.title: 75: Fat Man & Bernardin & Batman & Robin
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: After what felt akin to a Bane-like break, the Bat-chat returns! Forever! What better way to kick off our next tour through Gotham city than with another visit from Fat Cave fixture Marc Bernardin and the much-asked for commentary track to Joel Schumacher's BATMAN & ROBIN. Pt. 1 of 2.

episodes.title: #74: Burt Ward: Rocking Robin
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: This week in the Fat Cave: Kevin and Ralph share the stage with one half of the Dynamic Duo, Mr. Burt Ward. Recorded LIVE at Stan Lee’s Comikaze on November 1, 2014.

episodes.title: #73: Lego Batman 3: Beyond Gotham - The NYCC Panel
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: This week, we finally return to the Fat Cave to get on with some Bat chat from this year's New York Comic-Con, where we learned there was a new guy in Gotham: Fat Kev Smith! With Special Guests Greg Miller, Arthur Parson, Stephen Sharples, Geoff Johns, Troy Baker, and Stephen Amell.

episodes.title: #72: Neal Adams: Ad-Man Forever
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! The legendary Neal Adams returns for part 2 of a 2 part trip into the storied past of DC, Marvel and the entire comic book industry.

episodes.title: #71: Neal Adams: Ad-Man Returns
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! The legendary Neal Adams returns for part 1 of a 2 part trip into the storied past of DC, Marvel and the entire comic book industry.

episodes.title: #66: Batman 66 Meets The Green Hornet Kickoff Party
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week: Hear a comic book come to life and learn how the dorky hosts of the HOLLYWOOD BABBLE-ON podcast got a dream gig writing the DC Comics crossover event, BATMAN '66 MEETS THE GREEN HORNET! We start with a history of how it happened and wrap up with a dramatic (and comedic) live reading of issue 1 - now available in stores and online. Recorded LIVE at the Petersen Automotive Museum in Los Angeles, California.

episodes.title: #70: Jamie Walton: Funding The Wayne Foundation
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! As a child, Jamie Walton was a victim of sex trafficking. To help others escape her one-time fate, she's been building The Wayne Foundation - a halfway house for escapees like her. Hear her heroic tale of fighting the most cowardly of all the criminal lot: kid rapists.

episodes.title: #69: The Paley Center: Batman at 75 - To All a Dark Knight!
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week: We head to New York City's Paley Center for a panel celebrating Batman's birthday! With Kevin Conroy, Chip Kidd, Marc Tyler Nobleman, Michael Uslan and a Fat Man, moderated by USA Today's Pop Candy herself, Whitney Mathewson.

episodes.title: #68: WonderCon Panel: 75 Years of Batman
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: This week, we leave the Fat Cave altogether and head to WonderCon in Anaheim for a panel celebrating Batman's 75th Birthday. Featuring Jim Lee, Kevin Conroy, Peter Girardi, Bruce Timm, Kevin Smith and Ralph Garman. Moderated by DC Vice President of Marketing John Cunningham.

episodes.title: #67: Joe Quesada: Fat Man on Cap, Man
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, we table the Bat chat to have a Cap chat, when Marvel icon Joe Quesada gives us the not-so secret origin of CAPTAIN AMERICAN 2: THE WINTER SOLDIER

episodes.title: #65: Dean Trippe: Something Beautiful from Something Terrible
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week: When he was just a boy something terrible happened to Dean Trippe. But the story of Bruce Wayne and the never ending battle of the Batman gave him the strength to draw out his demons in the breathtaking autobiographical comic, SOMETHING TERRIBLE.

episodes.title: #64: Chris Daughtry: Idolizing the Bat
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! All he wanted to do was draw comics. But the same artist who inspired him also made him realize comics weren't in his cards. So he turned to singing instead... and became an American Idol. Listen as musician and vocalist Chris Daughtry gets geeky about Gotham.

episodes.title: #63: Joe Quesada: Marveling at the Dark Might-Have-Been
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, to celebrate Batman's 75th Birthday, we talk to the Man Without Fear from Marvel - comics legend Joe Quesada! From the paneled page to the board room, hear the star-cros't tale of how the first artist to ever become Editor-in-Chief at Marvel Comics eventually became the Chief Creative Officer of Marvel Entertainment... all because of the Dark Knight.

episodes.title: #62: Denny O'Neil Pt. 3: Bat-ling the Bottle and Rockin' Robin
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, it's the end of our 3 Part love-fest with legendary Bat-writer and editor Denny O'Neil! Hear how Denny's own demons inspired Batman's battle with the drug Venom, and learn all about the fallout from killing the Boy Wonder! Part 3 of 3.

episodes.title: #61: Denny O'Neil Pt. 2: The Professor from Gotham University
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, it's more convo with one of the four faces of Mount Rushmore, legendary Bat-writer and editor Denny O'Neil! Hear about the origins of the HARD TRAVELING HEROES, learn how much Batman owes The Shadow, and hear about the Birth of The Demon! Part 2 of 3.

episodes.title: #60: Denny O'Neil Pt. 1: Hard Traveling Hero
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! It's the man who brought dignity back to the Bat after camp was over! Legendary Bat writer and editor Denny O'Neil takes us back to the Silver Age of comics, when Stan Lee taught him the skills he'd use to redefine the Dark Knight. Part 1 of 3.

episodes.title: #59: Bernardin Forever, Pt. 2
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week we continue our journey back to 1995 with Fat Cave fixture Marc Bernardin, and hear all the Tommy Lee groans we make while providing a commentary track for Joel Schumacher's BATMAN FOREVER. Pt. 2 of 2.

episodes.title: #58: Bernardin Forever, Pt. 1
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! Journey back to 1995 with Fat Cave fixture Marc Bernardin, and hear all the Tommy Lee groans we make while providing a commentary track for Joel Schumacher's BATMAN FOREVER. Pt 1 of 2.

episodes.title: #57: We Are Batman: The Legends of the Knight Movie
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! Tampa wedding filmmaker Brett Culp had an idea for a documentary about the importance and relevance of the Batman character to people in real life. And with the help of his wife Tricia, IndieGoGo and Kickstarter, he made it happen! Learn all about the documentary LEGENDS OF THE KNIGHT, and find out how you can Tugg a screening out in YOUR local movie theater.

episodes.title: #56: Neal Adams Takes Us on a Batman Odyssey
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! Living Legend Neal Adams tells us how he draws the Dark Knight, breaks down some of his iconic covers, and tells us all about his return to Gotham with BATMAN: ODYSSEY. Part 3 of 3

episodes.title: #55: Neal Adams: Neal with The Deal
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! Living Legend Neal Adams continues the oral Odyssey through his storied career in comics, including the fight for truth and justice on behalf of Superman creators Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster. An epic listen. Part 2 of 3.

episodes.title: #54: Neal Adams: Kneel Before Neal
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! Green Arrow. Green Lantern(s). Superman. DeadMan. Man-Bat. Ra’s Al Ghul. And of course, Batman. The medium-defining hands of Neal Adams drew your entire childhood (even the X-Men). And in this first of a three part conversation, Neal takes us back to the Golden and Silver Ages of comics, including the creation of the John Stewart Green Lantern. Part 1 of 3.

episodes.title: #53: Marc Tyler Nobleman: The Fickle Finger of Fledermaus
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, we catch up on a month's worth of Bat-chat before learning all about Golden Age Batman scribe Bill Finger from Marc Tyler Nobleman, author of BILL THE BOY WONDER: THE SECRET CO-CREATOR OF BATMAN.

episodes.title: #52: Paul Dini: Shadow of the Shadow of the Bat
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, Bat-scribe extraordinaire Paul Dini returns to explore the other animated offerings of the Caped Crusader, but just can't stay out of the Shadow of the Bat. Pt. 2 of 2

episodes.title: #51: Paul Dini: Shadow of the Bat
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, Harley Quinn creator and legendary Bat-booster Paul Dini returns and accidentally creates the greatest non-Batman Batman show you will never see! Pt. 1 of 2

episodes.title: #50: The Comic Book Men Go Bat-Shit LIVE!
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
In the Fat Cave this week, we celebrate our milestone 50th episode by leaping into the Batmobile and racing to the modern-day Gotham of New York City to chat with the cast of AMC's COMIC BOOK MEN! Hear how much the Dark Knight means to Walt, Bry, Ming and Mike, LIVE in front of a sold out crowd at NYC's venerable comedy landmark, Caroline's on Broadway! 
Recorded Live at Caroline's in NYC, on 10/10/2013.

episodes.title: #49: Bernardin Returns for Batman Returns
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, Hollywood Reporter editor and Fat Cave fixture Marc Bernardin comes back to chat about the Bat and the Cat and poke fun at the Penguin, as we provide a commentary track for 1992's BATMAN RETURNS.

episodes.title: #48: Scott Snyder & Greg Capullo: The Dynamic Duo
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, it's a superhero team-up when the white hot Bat scribe and the legendary Bat scribbler join forces to detail the Dark Knight's Zero Year!

episodes.title: #47: Burton, Batman & Bernardin
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, we finish our dance with the devil in the pale moonlight when we watch the second half of Tim Burton's 1989 BATMAN with Hollywood Reporter editor and Fat Cave alumnus Marc Bernardin. Pt. 2 of 2.

episodes.title: #46: Batfleck Begins and Burton's Batman
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, the Fat Man weighs in on the controversial casting of the century, as the Dark Knight rises very close to home! After that, come dance with the devil in the pale moonlight when we watch the first half of Tim Burton's 1989 BATMAN with Hollywood Reporter editor and Fat Cave alumnus Marc Bernardin. Pt. 1 of 2.

episodes.title: #45: Read Along With Kev, Vol. 2
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, the Killing Joke controversy kicked up by last week's episode leads to another appreciation of Alan Moore's Batman - this time in SWAMP THING issues 52 and 53. Hear the Fat Man give voice to one of his favorite Batman stories of all time: The Greening of Gotham!

episodes.title: #44: More with Morrison
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, it's the return of Batmasterpiece maker and living legend Grant Morrison! The scribe from Scotland talks about ending his epic flight with the Dark Knight, his future dream date with the real Wonder Woman, and his favorite Bat tale of all time!

episodes.title: #43: Higgins' Pickin's
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, BATMAN BEYOND digital comic and NIGHTWING author Kyle Higgins finishes his list of 5 Batman stories you might not know. But before that, we give the departed Michael Ansara a 21 Freeze Gun salute.

episodes.title: #42: Higgins' List
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, the author of Batman: Gates of Gotham and the writer of Nightwing Kyle Higgins returns to talk about his new BATMAN BEYOND digital comic and share his 5 favorite Bat tales you might've missed! Plus: JUSTICE LEAGUE: THE FLASHPOINT PARADOX gets a sloppy BJ'er.

episodes.title: #41: JLA #14
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: There's no guest in the Fat Cave this week so the Fat Man READS Batman instead. Get an hour of slow oral from the director of CLERKS as he takes you through one of his favorite Batman stories of all time: 1997's JLA # 14, written by Grant Morrison. Expect lots of tears.

episodes.title: #40: Man of Steel Super Special: Fat Man and Gar-Man on Superman
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, we check in on the other half of the World's Finest fighting duo, and discuss Batman's partner in crime-fighting - the Big Blue Boy Scout from Metropolis, Superman! As the Last Son of Krypton dominates the box office in MAN OF STEEL, we celebrate the return of the Big S with a podcast nearly as long as the movie itself! With Special Guest Villain Ralph Garman!

episodes.title: #39: Greg Capullo: Bat Out of Hell
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, Marvel/Image/DC legend and the King of Candor Greg Capullo returns to take us through the Image years and Mr. Todd's wild ride! Learn how Greg's life took a dark turn before he met the Dark Knight and find out which part of the Bat this master artist draws first! Part 2 of 2.

episodes.title: #38: Greg Capullo: The Art of Owls
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, the mean streets of Gotham City lead us to the meaner streets of Schenectady, NY that spawned comic book legend Greg Capullo! Hear how the Court of Owls artist learned to draw on a family gift that earned him top gigs at Marvel and Image long before he took up permanent residence in Wayne Manor. Part 1 of 2.

episodes.title: #37: Jim Lee: Giving Batman the Boot
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, legendary artist Jim Lee drops dime on drawing the Dark Knight from cowl to treads. Learn what bits of the Bat are the most fun to draw and get an education in the business of comic books from the Image co-founder turned  DC Comics Co-Publisher! Part 2 of a 2 part Comics History 101 class.

episodes.title: #36: Jim Lee: Un-Hushed
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, hear how the medical world's loss was the comics' world biggest gain when legendary rock star artist Jim Lee recounts his long road to Gotham and drawing the Dark Knight. The DC Comics Co-Publisher takes us back to his career-defining days at Marvel and a history-making gig as co-founder of Image in Part 1 of a 2 Part Comics History 101 class.

episodes.title: #35: Dan Didio: Who's Who in The New 52
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, DC Comics Co-Publisher Dazzlin' Dan Didio goes from comic book fandom to the comic book boardroom, bringing some of the biggest names in the business to Batman along the way. Hear Dan demystify DC's New 52 and give a tease of the next giant DC crossover event!

episodes.title: #34: Stan Lee: 'Nuff Said!
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! It's the Mark Twain of Comic Books! The Father of Modern Mythology! The Man who launched a billion smiles creating characters that have earned billions of dollars each! And as if that's not enough, he actually knew Batman creator Bob Kane! The Name Amongst Names! How does something as big as the creator of the most important titles in comics history coming to my mall get by me? Ladies and gentlemen, I give you the Sensational Stan Lee! Get ready to take a trip back in time (and Timely) for Stantastic stories and amazing anecdotes from the Mad Men Era of Comics!

episodes.title: #33: Jeph Loeb: The Long Interview About The Long Halloween, Part 2
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! Movies-to-comics pioneer and super-scribe Jeph Loeb talks about his first Batman epic and the healing power of writing comics in Part 2 of an epic discussion with one of the Dark Knight's greatest allies.

episodes.title: #32: Jeph Loeb: The Long Interview About The Long Halloween, Part 1
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week! Meet a movies-to-comics pioneer and the head of Marvel TV - Joltin' Jeph Loeb! Hear how the author of some of the best and best selling Bat books of all time hitched a ride to Gotham with a Teen Wolf and the Governator! Part 1 of 2.

episodes.title: #31:  Christopher Drake: Keeping Score for the Batman
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, lend your ears to composer Christopher Drake for Part 2 of a look at the music of the Batman and other DCU characters he's scored over a series of Warner Animation features! This time, we pick three scenes from THE DARK KNIGHT RETURNS, PT. 1 & 2 that showcase Drake's take on the ghouls of Gotham.

episodes.title: #30: Christopher Drake: Music of the Knight
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, we feel the music  when we talk to the composer of THE DARK KNIGHT RETURNS Pt. 1 and Pt. 2, Christoper Drake! From Wonder Woman to Superman to Green Lantern to Batman to the entire Justice League - Chris has scored all the biggest heroes in the DCU. Hear what it takes to put the super into hero.

episodes.title: #29: Geoff Johns: Shazam, Batman!
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, we travel deeper into the DC Universe in Part 2 of our DC-scussion with Chief Creative Officer Geoff Johns! The award-winning author takes us into his best-selling graphic novel BATMAN: EARTH ONE, where we meet an all-too human Bruce Wayne and an Alfred who packs heat! All that plus: meet the New 52 Captain Marvel!

episodes.title: #28: Geoff Johns: Batman Beta
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, meet one of the nicest and most talented guys in the Bat business! Geoff Johns, the author of BATMAN: EARTH ONE and Chief Creative Officer of DC Comics, tells us how a love of the Flash in his Michigan childhood sped him all the way to the planet Oa, Gotham and Central Cities, Metropolis and another fictional world called Hollywood!

episodes.title: #27: Grant Morrison: Bat Christ
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, we make room for the Doom, as we continue our discussion with genius emeritus Grant Morrison, talking Doom Patrol, X-Men and his six year stint in Gotham and feelings on the Dark Knight as a religious symbol!

episodes.title: #26: Grant Morrison: Bat Bard
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, a Bat-tacular guest so immense, even the Dark Knight himself would call him a legend!  Grant Morrison - the genius author behind ARKHAM ASYLUM and THE INVISIBLES - makes the trip from Glasgow to Gotham for a wee bit o' Bat worship and a journey into the mystical and magical land of Katmandu!

episodes.title: #25: Dark Knight Returns Pt. 2 Commentary Track with Marc Bernardin
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Our good pal and writer Marc Bernardin joins us in the Fat Cave this week to pour over every frame of the second part of the brand new animated feature based on Frank Miller's Batmasterpiece. Line it up with the flick for screen-specific chit-chat!

episodes.title: #24: Beverly Hills Bat: The Dark Knight Returns Pt. 2 Panel at The Paley Center
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week the Fat Man and the Batman meet as Kevin hosts an all-star panel at the West Coast premiere for the Dark Knight Returns Pt. 2 including Bruce Timm, director Jay Oliva, writer Bob Goodman, dialogue/casting director Andrea Romano, Ariel Winter and Peter Weller. Recorded at The Paley Center, Beverly Hills, CA.

episodes.title: #23: Kyle Higgins: On Playing with HIS Dick
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, Part 2 of our Dick-tacular, Dick-tastic, Dick-flavored Dick-scussion with Nightwing scribe and NY Times Best Selling author of Gates of Gotham, Kyle Higgins. This time, we actually talk about Nightwing.

episodes.title: #22: Kyle Higgins: Master of Dick
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, current Nightwing scribe and NY Times Best Selling author of Gates of Gotham Kyle Higgins joins us for the first of a two parter dedicated to the Dark Knight's junior partner, the Boy Wonder himself - Dick Grayson!

episodes.title: #21: Paul Dini: The Dini Dossiers Pt. 4
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, we conclude our month-long Bat-tastic series of commentary tracks we call The Dini Dossiers! Kev and BATMAN genius Paul Dini watch a pair of Holiday-themed  episodes from BATMAN: THE ANIMATED SERIES, and throw in a JUSTICE LEAGUE for free! Line up the podcast with your DVD/downloaded copy to follow along, or just listen and enjoy!

episodes.title: #20: Paul Dini: The Dini Dossiers Pt. 3
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, we continue our month-long Bat-tastic series of commentary tracks entitled The Dini Dossiers! BATMAN genius Paul Dini watches BATMAN BEYOND: RETURN OF THE JOKER and talks about how it came to be! Line up the podcast with your DVD or downloaded copy and follow along!

episodes.title: #19: Scott Snyder: Of Cowls and Owls
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, beware the Court of Owls that watches all the time, ruling Gotham from a shadowed perch, behind granite and lime. New 52 Batman mastermind Scott Snyder has talent and Talons to spare as he shares tales of a passionate journey to Gotham City that took him to infinity and beyond.

episodes.title: #18: Paul Dini: The Dini Dossiers Pt. 2
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, we continue our month-long Bat-tastic series of commentary tracks entitled The Dini Dossiers! BATMAN: THE ANIMATED SERIES co-creator Paul Dini watches two of his favorite episodes, offering first-hand insight into their greatness! This week, listen along as Paul talks about BATMAN: MASK OF THE PHANTASM! Line up the podcast with your DVD or downloaded copy and follow along!

episodes.title: #17: Paul Dini: The Dini Dossiers Pt. 1
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: We return to the Fat Cave this week with the first part in a month-long Bat-tastic series of commentary tracks entitled The Dini Dossiers!  BATMAN: THE ANIMATED SERIES co-creator Paul Dini watches two of his favorite episodes, offering first-hand insight into their greatness! This week, we watch HEART OF ICE and OVER THE EDGE! Line up the podcast with your DVD or downloaded copy and follow along!

episodes.title: #16: Diedrich Bader: The Hammers of Justice
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, in Pt. 2 the Hammers of Justice continue to swing as BATMAN: THE BRAVE & THE BOLD's Diedrich Bader shares tales of working on OFFICE SPACE, THE DREW CAREY SHOW and NAPOLEON DYNAMITE before heading to the rooftops of Gotham as the Caped Crusader himself!

episodes.title: #15: Diedrich Bader: Brave, Bold and Bader
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, prepare to be pounded by the Hammers of Justice! Diedrich Bader tells us how a movie theater in France led to the rooftops of Gotham City in BATMAN: THE BRAVE & THE BOLD. Pt. 1 of 2

episodes.title: #14: Dark Knight Returns Pt. 1 Commentary Track with Marc Bernardin
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Writer Marc Bernardin joins us in the Fat Cave this week to pour over every frame of the brand new animated feature based on Frank Miller's Batmasterpiece. Line it up with the flick for screen-specific chit-chat!

episodes.title: #13: Adam West: True West
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: It's turbines to speed as the Fat-Mobile races out of the Fat Cave this week for a little trip to the wild West, at Stan Lee's Comikaze! And after that, old chum, the Fat Signal is answered by the Bright Knight himself: TV's OG Batman, icon Adam West!

episodes.title: #12: Ralph Garman: The Diss Knight Returns
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, the Garmy invades Christopher Nolan's Gotham and starts dropping logic bombs. Hollywood Babble-On's Ralph Garman isn't afraid of the DARK KNIGHT RISES - he's angry.

episodes.title: #11: Kevin Conroy: Batman Himself
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week: actor Kevin Conroy takes us on his journey from New York City's Broadway to Gotham City's Crime Alley! Hear how the man who has been the Bat more than anyone else in the world harnessed his personal pain to find the voice of the Dark Knight!

episodes.title: #10: Walt Flanagan: BatFlanagan
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, Walt returns to discuss Dark Knight Rises and his 10 favorite Batman stories.

episodes.title: #9: Ralph Garman: Bat-Fan Forever
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week - a lifelong fan's perspective! From a mom-made cardboard Bat-cave in Philadelphia to a star on the Hollywood Walk-of-Fame, hear how the Adam West Batman influenced and shaped the life of Hollywood Babble-On host Ralph Garman!

episodes.title: #8: The Dark Knight Rises
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week, Kev spoils The Dark Knight Rises for guest, SModcast's Scott Mosier! Part 1 of 2, Continued on SModcast #218.

episodes.title: #7: Bruce Timm: The Batman of Batman Artists
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week: A boy from Oklahoma scribbles his way into history as THE quintessential Batman artist. The genius behind the look and feel of BATMAN: THE ANIMATED SERIES, BATMAN BEYOND and the entire DC Animated Universe reveals his secret origin!

episodes.title: #6: Walt Flanagan: Comic Book Man
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week: The Qui Gon of Comics. The Guru of Graphic Novels. Fan. Retailer. Penciler. Professional. Legend. Walt Flanagan tells us how a box of comics from his Mom eventually leads to a dream gig plotting and penciling the New York Times Best-Seller BATMAN: CACOPHONY.  Plus: a big reveal from WIDENING GYRE BOOK 2!

episodes.title: #5: Arleen Sorkin: Harley Quinn's Origin
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week: It's Arleen Sorkin, Puddin'! The muse and voice behind Harley Quinn tells us how a girl from Washington, D.C. would impact the Batman universe forever.

episodes.title: #4: Tara Strong: Batgirl, Bubbles and Bronies
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week: A little Canadian girl grows up to be Batgirl. And Bubbles. And Twilight Sparkle. And Raven. And a Rugrat. And Mary Jane Watson. And Hello Kitty. Girl of one thousand voices Tara Strong tells us how she went from a temple in Toronto to the cartoon rooftops of Gotham City.

episodes.title: #3: Mark Hamill: The People’s Joker, Pt. 2
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the Fat Cave this week: A long time ago, in a galaxy far, far away... A boy who loved comic books grew up to be the Joker! The legendary Mark Hamill takes us into the mouth of madness itself and on the journey of a lifetime that will lead to the lair of the Clown Prince of Crime!

episodes.title: #2: Mark Hamill: The People's Joker, Pt. 1
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)

episodes.title: #1: Paul Dini
episodes.author: will@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
In the Fat Cave this week: Meet the man who created Harley Quinn! Batman: The Animated Series legend and Batman: Arkham City game writer Paul Dini reveals how working for Fat Albert led to writing some of the most definitive Dark Knight stories ever told!
(Fat Man on Batman theme song by @CompleteMySong. Vocals by The Fat Man Who Loves Batman)
